titleStmt.title: The vocacyon of Ioha[n] Bale to the bishiprick of Ossorie in Irela[n]de his persecucio[n]s in ye same, & finall delyueraunce ...
titleStmt.author: Bale, John, 1495-1563.

publicationStmt.publisher: Before the castell of S.Angell, at ye signe of S. Peter [i.e. by J. Lambrecht? for Hugh Singleton],

notesStmt.note: The imprint is false; possibly printed at Wesel by J. Lambrecht (STC).
With an index and a final colophon leaf with errata.
Identified as STC 1308 on UMI microfilm reel 171.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library and the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Appears at reel 171 (Bodleian Library copy) and at reel 485 (Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery copy).
